Whenever I play this game, there's nothing that can make me happier. I want to marry this game and have it hold my hand gently and smile at me as I pass onto the next life on my deathbed, only to meet this game again and forge a new relationship to re-live the joy. If I could trap time in a bottle, the first thing that I'd like to do, is save every day in an eternity and then spend it all with this game, and the friends whom I play it with. Half-Life Deathmatch: Source is the best game of all time. There is simply no question. It is the penultimate FPS experience.

Oh boy this was a bit hard because I like old half life PvP combat but i digress. This game is just a better version of Half Life Deathmatch from... Half Life so if you own the og HL game theres no need of playing this one. Second well this place is kinda deserted so yea theres like 1 server I joined for a while because it actually had players. But we gotta move to other things, I got this game in the Orange Box and I only played it to talk about this one for a vid i made in my channel and after that just wanted to see it myself in a normal "just for fun enviroment" I actually enjoyed it but realised later on, this game hasn't aged well and its in the source engine, it just looks to glossier, the weapons dont look good, their textures are like mirrors and has some of the issues from the release of Half Life Source

This game is good. Not amazing, but good. Again, the playerbase isn't as active as it used to be, but on a sunday you can usually find 3 or 4 people online. Its half-life source, remade as deathmatch.

[h1] Half-Life Deathmatch: Source [/h1]

[b] A Dead Game That Had No Fun Times To Be Had [/b]

I tried this title out hoping it would be as fun as [b] Half-Life 2: Deathmatch [/b], but I was sorely mistaken. There was really only one somewhat active server, and it only had less than five players. The shooting felt poor (attributed to Half-Life: Source itself), and the hit detection was extremely spotty. Nothing remarkable can really be said about this game, other than that its really old, really unpopulated, and really bad.

[h2] Final Verdict: 1/10 (Terrible) [/h2]

If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my curator page for my thoughts on a variety of other games!

Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

Like with the singleplayer game you can skip this port and focus on the original game. Nowadays it's virtually dead with no players anyway so it's not really worth the time.

It's basically Half-Life, but in Free-for-all form. All the weapons from Half-Life are in here.

This game is DEAD though. So if you can host a private server and get a couple of your friends to play, then this game is awesome!

Great for fans of the original Half-Life. Not so good for people who just wanna play. There are much more people playing the original Half-Life Deathmatch and not the Source "remake" version. Just don't expect to find anyone playing on a Public server.

Es un muy buen juego para jugar con amigos, aunque actualmente no recomiendo su compra debido a que está prácticamente muerto y digo prácticamente porque muy de vez en cuando hay 1 o 2 servidores con gente.

lo mismo, con graficos mejorados, pero sin gente

Simplemente, uno de los mejores deathmatchs que he probado, simplemente, un remix del deathmatch del half-life clásico pero con el motor gráfico source (que es con el que se hizo half-life 2), simplemente, una obra maestra de los clásicos deathmatch

En cuánto a armas y a jugabilidad, es la misma que del 1, pero remasterizado, y con skins mejores en los jugadores
Mapas nuevos, grandes y los que ya estaban, remasterizados con nuevas salas y secretos

El juego solo tiene una única desventaja, que ya esta muy hablada, que ya no hay casi jugadores, tal vez por las tardes, hayan más de 12 jugadores en distintos servidores, pero en todo lo demás, vacío, aunque si estas en un server, seguro que te divertiras por las kills que haces, y por la gente que se pone la skin de gordan freeman (ya se que es gordon, pero yo le llamo asi) que te vendran ahi todo locos con su palanca intentando matarte cuerpo a cuerpo, seguro que te echarás unas risas xD, por todo lo demás, simplemente, asombroso...
P.D: A parte, es ideal para partidas rápidas, ya que la mayoría de lo servidores, sus mapas solo duran entre 5 minutos a 10 o un poco más, asi te echarás una rápida si te tienes que ir a un sitio

9/10 || No tiene un 10 por una razón, los tipos de jugadores, ya que la mayoría son expertos y te mataran fácilmente, aunque si piensas bien en un plan, es fácil matarlos || Muy recomendable -- Very Good DeathMatch -- Te echarás unas risas en este juego

Pero si no, pues también se puede usar para aprovechar un rato haciendo las siguientes cosas:

- Explorar los mapas
- Jugar con las 2 personas que queden
- Buscar 1000 maneras de morir (?)

Как игрок который играет в Half Life более 5 лет, скажу - игра г***о. Поиграв даже 20 минут, скажу что мягко говоря это  не возрождение культовой игры, а ее уродливый клон на не менее специфическом движке. Баланс оружий тут ужасный - лом прервратили в нож из кс, наносит по 5 дамага, арбалет тут сломан, мало того что болт долго летит, так еще и урон также урезали. Чтобы убить игрока, надо попасть в него 3-4 (!) раза с арбалета, а как вы попадете - уже ваши проблемы. Дробовик просто немощное оружие, хоть и самое эффективное в этом дм. И то, если стрелять 3 пули за раз, попадет все, но дамаг будет чуть чуть выше чем выстрел с 1 патрона. Вывод - игра кал, покупать не стоит, слава богу досталась в подарок с хл2дм (или хл2, уже не помню).

А онлайн тут мертв, да, одни боты играют.

ДОСТОИНСТВА:
Стилистика, комьюнити.
НЕДОСТАТКИ:
Текстуры, цена, огромное количество багов.
Все помнят легендарную игру - Half-Life. Игра получила награды за лучшую одиночную кампанию, и мультиплеер. Много было проведено турниров где игроки решали, кто из них лучше, точнее, у кого лучше реакция. После выхода Half-Life 2, много классических игр были перенесены на движок Source.
